revision.text:
__NOTOC__{{DISPLAYTITLE: GetSpriteRotation}} int '''GetSpriteRotation''' (int ''ptr'')
== Usage == Retrieves the ''ptr'''s SpriteRotation.
== Parameters == * ''ptr'': The [[Actor pointer]] to check.
== Return value == Returns the pointer's SpriteRotation in degrees.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
